definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
at a distance of/distance/to be apart

sentences.english: Sorching summer, choose here and nature zero distance contact.

sentences.english: To directly contact Sun Wukong, or Monkey Sun, of course you should go to Huaguo Mountain.

sentences.english: Keep vegetables as near to hand as you can.
Up close, it is made up of individual sounds and instruments.

sentences.english: But you've never been near one.

definition: to explore a mystery/to probe the unknown
real scene (not set up or posed)/real location (not a film studio set or theater)/live action (not animation)
(idiom) to experience it for oneself/to actually *be* there (as opposed to reading about it etc)
lit. not putting a foot outside/to stay at home
